content: Yes, there have been reports of natural disasters that have caused significant damage to the construction industry in Nagano in recent times. One such instance is the torrential rain that hit the region in July 2018, causing landslides and floods that damaged many buildings and infrastructure projects. Also, in 2014, a severe earthquake hit Nagano, causing damage to buildings and infrastructure in the region. According to reports, the cumulative damage of both disasters was estimated to be nearly $1 billion. These natural disasters highlight the importance of incorporating hazard-resilient designs and implementing innovative solutions to ensure the safety and sustainability of construction activities in Nagano and other disaster-prone areas.
